title: AED Training and Understanding Design Impact

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training for language learners to acquire AED usage and understand how design differences impact emergency response

learning_goals: Learners can perform AED usage procedures with 90% accuracy in a simulated environment
Learners can explain three or more potential confusion factors when using different AED models
Learners can measure the impact of AED design differences on emergency response time within a 20-second error margin

resources: AED simulator software with diverse design interfaces
Video tutorials on AED usage procedures

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
